output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF (CMF11240017) - Yes, this indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidate - Yes, mentions "premierul Marcel Ciolacu" who is also a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population - Yes, it's a paid post with 30,000-35,000 impressions 4. Electoral objective - Yes, it promotes PSD's achievements and explicitly mentions PSD's governance as a "guarantee" for future development 5. Journalism - No, this is clearly promotional content 6. Personal opinion - No, this is an official party communication with clear electoral intentions
The post combines both parliamentary and presidential campaign elements by: - Promoting PSD's achievements - Highlighting Marcel Ciolacu's role as Prime Minister - Making future promises about infrastructure development - Using campaign messaging (CMF number)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Makes campaign promises - Promotes party achievements - Directly references Marcel Ciolacu's actions - Has significant paid reach - Contains explicit political messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Social Democrat Org. Jud. Botosani, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 578469851326101) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, material care il promoveaza pe candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu prin evidentierea realizarilor sale ca premier si promisiuni electorale. Materialul contine numar CMF (11240017), are caracter electoral explicit, si a fost distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact intre 30.000 si 35.000 de afisari, demonstrand intentia clara de a influenta alegatorii in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
